title: Honor after game
body:
Have you ever forgotten to honor player after game you wanted to, and you left Post game screen?
I'm thinking that Riot should add 5 minute or so to honor player you played with in recent match, so even if you forget and go to home screen or into room with your friends to play next match, you can still do it.
It would be, for example, in match history possibility to honor players.

replies.body:
"You have been reported for unsportsmanlike conduct. We know everyone has bad days..."

"An ally has honored you for: +1 friendly"

One game.

Never used chat.

I don't know anymore.
One time I called our jungle yi a potato in all chat and still got honoured
People love potatoes.
Potatoes make terrible league players though
at least it's an original insult
At least it's an amazing insult.
He was calling him a baby, right?
No. A potato.

Well, I'm not surprised. Plenty of time, an A-hole was threatening to report someone for no good reason, so I honored them just to restore their faith in humanity. And I'm pretty sure I'm not the only one doing that.
This would be nice. Then again, ANY attention to the honor system would be nice...

I like this idea.

It always kinda stinks when that happens and I feel bad because if I am to honor someone (especially an opponent) they really earned my respect/admiration.

It is quite a good feeling to receive the recognition of a job well done by getting an honor after a match. This is especially so when it's from an opponent after a hard fought loss.
No but i didnt report most of the times.
Yes. I have been wanting this for a long time.
I always forget my honor after game since i lost it while playing.
{{champion:157}} Edgy
I don't honor the teams unless they deserve it!

This post needs more visibility :)

+1 and bump
Honor ?? what is that, i have to quit the post game screen as fast as possible nowadays since all you can get from this screen is EXTERM TOXCITY CHAT experiance even more toxic than in game chat
ALso add a report option for the people you just played with/against; Sometimes the screen bugs out postgame or takes forever to load, so it could help.

Honor for "Helpful" is kind of out dated and misleading though. Helpful is only relevant during a very tiny window of your LoL infancy whereas Teamwork is much more relevant to teammates being strong and productive.

I usually always honor my team if they did well, even if we lost the game.....**If i don't honor, it means that i was tilted off the face of the planet due to a toxic player..i forgot to honor you after reporting the toxic player**...Then when i go back to the dash, the realization hits me like a ton of bricks and il end up feeling guilty for forgetting about it afterward......

use real humans beings that need water and food to live and not hate love the honoring system.
It would be nice if it got some attention.
I have a couple times; but more often than not, most people I run into, aren't respectable enough to deserve honor.

"Recently played with" -> [right click] -> give honor (or report).
Tencent, please. :|


Though it's kinda odd, as seemingly the current honor these days is not getting reported.
People actually use that?
Just don't honor at all. Simple as that.
